data.text: @lottielo90 @jai_lokwani No matter how many planes are sent, they are also in their own national airspace. Taiwan has been China's territory since ancient times and belongs to China. Taiwan has never declared independence. The brands participating in international events are Chinese Taipei.

@jai_lokwani Taiwan has always been China's territory and has not declared independence. The United Nations follows the one China principle. China is not occupying Taiwan. Taiwan is just a Rebel Province of China.
